title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 48.3 - Contents of notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 48.3 - Contents of notice

State Regulations
A notice filed pursuant to section
48.2
(b) of this

Part shall set forth in detail that special circumstances exist which warrant
approval of the proposed change in accounting before the commission renders its
decision on the petitioner's next general rate filing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
48.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
